articles.title: Chhaya Kadam Shines In Mother's Golden Banarasi Saree, Maharashtrian Nath at Cannes 2024 - NDTV
articles.description: Cannes 2024: Foregoing designer gowns, Chhaya Kadam chose to honour her late mother by wearing her cherished Banarasi saree and traditional jewellery.

articles.title: Kamal Haasan extends birthday wish to Mohanlal, wants him to 'break Prem Nazir's record' | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: The actor’s message also pleased Mohanlal’s fans. “G.O.A.T recognises G.O.A.T. Happy birthday, Laletta!,” one user wrote.
